name: Hairy Face Salon: Messy Shave Makeover
name_original: Hairy Face Salon: Messy Shave Makeover
description:
Hairy Face Salon: Messy Shave Makeover is an arcade game developed by TabTale. It was originally released in 2014. TabTale published the game.
Hairy Face Salon: Messy Shave Makeover is available on iOS and Android.
